data.title: Interview with Édith Cresson (Paris, 29 January 2008) — Excerpt: the French position in the late 1980s and the role of François Mitterrand
meta_keywords: 29 january 2008) — excerpt: the french position in the late 1980s and the role of françois mitterrand
data.meta_description: In this interview, Édith Cresson, former French Minister for European Affairs, outlines the role of the administration in the establishment of France’s European policy and emphasises the importance of personal relationships, particularly describing the impetus provided by François Mitterrand.
